description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Casserole with Lemon & Mustard recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Casserole with Lemon & Mustard Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g small swiss brown mushrooms, sliced thickly
2 tsp fresh rosemary leaves, coarsely chopped
4 chicken thigh cutlets with skin on (from the poultry counter)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and butter in a large saut√© pan or casserole pan over medium heat. Season both sides of the chicken. Add chicken skin-side down and cook, for about 3 minutes or until golden, turn and cook further minute. Transfer to a plate.

Add onion, garlic and rosemary to same pan, cook over medium heat, stirring often until fragrant but not coloured. Add mushrooms. Cook, stirring, until moisture has evaporated. Add flour, cook, stirring for 1 minute. Stir in combined wine and stock, bring to the boil, simmer for 3-5 minutes until reduced slightly. Whisk in the cream and mustard then return the chicken to the pan.
Simmer, partially covered for 20-25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Squeeze over the lemon to taste, scatter with parsley. Serve with steamed green beans and crusty bread.
